string.text: What's going on here?
We're fighting, or more specifically, camping out like sitting ducks. Talk to Mole if you want to know more - he's the leader.
Man, that was a fight and a half - you wouldn't wish something like that on your worst enemy. Those Army boys are getting pretty cocky!
Where is the Agroprom Research Institute?
Not far from here. Follow the road to the West and you'll come to the Institutes gates.
I hear the Military have set up a base there, right?
Thanks for the information.
Help me, stalker!
Ok.
What are you doing?

I'm coming back from the factory, which is a bit further down the road. I don't know how, but the Army found out about our group. I didn't wait for them to show up and took off as quickly as I could. I hope our boys got out of there 'cause otherwise they won't be alive for much longer - you saw the choppers yourself.
I see, thanks.
I see, thanks.
Thanks for your help, stalker! If you hadn't shown up, I'd be a dead man by now.
I am looking for information about Strelok. Maybe you know something?
Where is this book now?

OK, go down this spiral staircase, past a few columns, and you will walk into a machine room. Keep an eye out for a safehouse in one of the rooms nearby, that's where I found that encrypted book with information though was unable to figure it out and the location is vague to me now. Good luck!
Thanks for the information.
Yes, tell me what you remember about where you found it.

I saw it in the underground. This is one of the many entrances that will lead you into the interconnected basements. I can try explain where it was, but you're on your own, the basement network is huge and confusing and full of weird mutants and theres no way I'm going back in there.
Seriy didn't send me here for nothing, and I just saved your ass, so if you know anything else about Strelok, now's the time to talk.
Thank you.
Yeah, we looked for it too but couldn't find it. I'll send you some info about it. That's everything we have on the stash.
Hi, I have a few questions.
Ask away, I'll try to answer.
Kulibin asked me to find him some tools.
Well, there was a factory and RI here. But... any valuable stuff is already out of there, you know.
Ok, thanks.
Actually, there's another thing: except the large Garbage, there is a small one in the Dark Valley - not many stalkers know about it. Look over there.
Well, now it's interesting. Thanks a lot!
You're welcome.

Yeah, there's a Military base. I'm not sure how many of them there are exactly but it's at least a platoon. They're well-armed and you've got no chance of breaking through - they'll take you down before you can say "hello, comrades". The best way of getting in is during the night 'cause the base is well-guarded during the day - they got checkpoints everywhere and anyway, I heard a deserter-soldier from that base is hiding in the marshes. If you can find him I'm sure you can shake some useful info out of him.
What's going on?
Me and my boys found a nice little area full of artifacts but those Military bastards attacked us for some reason. I don't know what the hell they wanted from us...

Yeah, I've heard about him. I think he used to "make his living" in this area - it's quite a good place, actually. He left a long time ago; I don't know when it was exactly and I've got no clue where he was headed. That's everything I can tell you.
You weren't waiting here for no reason, were you? Otherwise why would the Spetsnaz show up here?
OK, I know something about Strelok.
Yeah? I really need to know that!
If you lied to me, I'll find you and finish what the soldiers couldn't!
I'm not lying. I know that nobody trusts anyone here so you have little choice.

OK, listen. I found a book that might lead you to some information which would interested you, and if it gets into the right hands, it just might be very useful. I wanted to sell it to Barkeep, but since you saved my life, I'll let you have it.

OK, listen. They say Strelok used to sneak around here, and his stash is somewhere around here below ground. Its rumoured that he hid it in a pipe somewhere. We looked for the stash but we found jack shit, maybe you'll be luckier. This is everything I know.
What else do you know?
I don't know anything else. I told you everything I knew and now you have to work it out on your own. Good luck to you.
Hey stalker, good to see you again! What's up?
Tell me about this place.

This is the area around the Agroprom Research Institute. The Institute itself is to the Southwest. The factory, which served as the Institutes technical production facility, is to the North. The buildings have been abandoned for a long time and there's nothing to be found there, but the Army has been searching there very actively recently.
Tell me more about the Institute.

There are loads of legends about the Institute. Before the accident in 1986 the only thing here was the Institute of Crop Selection and Genetics. The area where the factory is now was used for experimental crop fields. After the accident, they closed the Institute and burned the fields. Then they remembered about it, they whitewashed the building, put up a fence around it and built some barracks. Hell knows what went on there but they sure as hell weren't short of funding.
Tell me more about the factory.

The factory was built at the end of the 80s. They said it was going to be used to build and test machines that could treat soil affected by radiation. As far as I know, nobody ever saw a single machine come out of that plant. It's totally empty now, which makes it a favorite spot for stalkers. I hear the place is pretty safe as long as you avoid the dark corners.
Thank you.
What are you doing here? I was told to check on you.
I'm hiding here. I don't want no trouble.
Who are you hiding from?
Well, I am a deserter according to the Military code and I have been wrongfully accused of murder. Until I can clear my name, I cannot go near the Military base or I'll be executed.
What were you accused of?

I am from the recon unit. They sent us into the catacombs to see what's going on below the base. It's hell down there, I'm telling you. I was the only one to get out of there... Everyone else is dead and those bastards have accused me of murdering all of my comrades!
Catacombs?
Underground tunnels. They go from the Institute to the area around it.
Oh, the underground, ok... So what actually happened down there?

You probably wouldn't believe me, but I'll tell you anyway. The Agroprom Research Institute, before the accident in 1986 was just the so-called "Institute of Crop Selection and Genetics." Apparently used for experimental crop testing. After the accident they fenced it off and built some barracks there. I didn't know what they did at the Institute before, but I know now. They were experimenting with animal genetics. If you saw the beast that I saw down there, you would understand how my group ended up!
Did this beast have tentacle-like things around its mouth and can turn invisible?
Yes! How did you know?
I have seen one before, very nasty creature, so I believe you for sure. Maybe I can talk to the Military for you and clear your name?

No! The Military wouldn't listen to fantasy stories from a stalker. There is another way though. In the institute, they have loads of old documents that tell of all the weird things that took place here. I'm sure it will mention this species in there. If you could, get the documents and take them to Barkeep for me. He has some high-powered connections that will listen to him.
Do you know where they keep these documents at the Institute?

At the HQ. It's on the third floor of the Institute. That's where they keep those damn papers. But it's a mission getting there. By day, the area is teaming with patrols but not as much at night. I'll tell you this for free: If you wanna get inside, you'll have to go through the catacombs - you stand no chance at the gate, but its up to you. Oh, one more thing: I have the RI guard chart. Not sure if it's new enough but still, it should help you.
Ok, I'll do it
Do you have the case yet?
Yes, it was exactly where you said.
Great, thanks very much! Please take it to Barkeep so that he can clear my name!
I'm on my way.
No, I'm working on it.
Please hurry, I cant stay in this place forever!
Have you taken the documents to Barkeep?
Not yet, but I'm on my way.
Barkeep has cleared my name. Thank you stalker, I owe you a world of gratitude.
No problem, glad to help.
Don't shoot, man!
Look, is this the case you're looking for?
Yes, it is! Have you already been to the institute?
Yup... What am I supposed to do with it? If you need it, just take it.
Nah, why would I want it? Take it to Barkeep, he'll use his own channels. Thank you again, stalker!
Ahhh, stalker, help me...
Here's a first aid kit.
I don't have a medkit, really sorry.
Oh, thanks...
Feeling better now?
Yeah, painkillers do work. Oh, those bastards...
What happened?
Hmm, not much...
Uh-huh. I see. See you later.

Alright, I'll tell - you saved me, after all. I'm one of the diggers and was trying to loot the underground. So, I found a set of tools - expensive one - and some other stuff. Then the bandits came, took everything and stabbed me. And you've saved me... thanks a lot! If we catch up later, there'll be something for you. And now I'm going to track down those bandits.
Well, good luck finding the morons.
I've got a couple of questions.
What do you want to know?
Anything interesting in the area?
How much do you need?
Here, take the money. Now tell me where it is.
Piss off!
Thank you.
Yeah, there are a couple of places but you'll have to share some of your wealth, buddy.
It used to be pretty quiet but now the Army has got all excited and started wasting everyone. They smoked the bandits out recently and I hear some managed to escape into the catacombs.
Thirty, deal?

The exit from the railway tunnel is nearby. It's fairly safe in the dead end. At least nobody has been eaten while sleeping... yet. Also, to the Northwest of the factory you'll find a marsh with a wagon in it. But be careful, there's a shitload of radiation around it, so it's best to approach it from the western side. Oh, and one more thing: a soldier has been spotted there. He's likely to be from the Military base at the Institute. The poor bastard is probably crazy - he's been there for a couple of days and I doubt he'll survive much longer on his own.
Bye!
Anything interesting happening here?
Do you know about Ratcatcher? The info will cost you 30.
Deal.
We have a local hero around here called Ratcatcher. He lives in the marshes. The man bred so many rats in the collectors that they'll soon eat those Army bastards.
Great. Thanks.
Tell me more about the collectors.
Collectors are your standard shit-stinking sewers that take waste from the Institute and dumps it in the nearest water reservoir.
Great. See you and take care of yourself.
I know that already. Thanks.
I don't have anything else to tell you.
I don't have enough cash.
I'm not interested.
Anything interesting happening here?
Nothing. Absolutely nothing.
I see. Bye!
Hello.
What's up?
Tell me about the collector. How do I get inside? Where are the exits and entrances?

It's dangerous inside the collector. There are six entrances and two of them are in the area around the Institute where the Military have set up a base. That area is patrolled and the Captain keeps the patrol schedule in his armory.
How do you know all that?
The rats told me.
...I see. Bye! Good luck to you.
Nothing. See you.
Who are you?
I live here, if you can call this a life. I breed rats in the collector to annoy the Military fucks at the Institute.
I am Ratcatcher.
What are you doing in this marsh?
Oh... I get it.... well, I'm from another story. Ha-ha-ha...
So you're the one repairing stuff here?
Well, I try. I'm just the handy man.
How did you get here?

I came here just now, a couple of hours ago. Was going to help Mole, but by the time I got there - they had already fended off the enemy and set up a camp. So I've decided to help, make the repairs around here. If things go well, I'll stay here.
And how are things going?

Not bad, but I did travel light, didn't take anything with me on the way here. Seems like there was a camp here before, because I found a stash with a lot of materials. It had everything I need except for the tools. And it's not so simple to make the repairs without them. Will you help me? If you find two or more sets of tools, I'll give a nice discount.
Both repairs and upgrades. Surely I can patch up a torn jacket but without tools there is nothing more I can do. Will you help me? If you find two or more sets of tools, I'll give a nice discount.
Alright, I'll help.
I've no idea, go ask Mole, he knows the territory.
Got it.
I'm here about the tools.
Is there anything new?
Yes, brought you tools for rough work.
Yes, I've found tools for fine work.
Yeah, here they are! A whole set of calibration tools. I hope you haven't found it yet.
Oh, good. Now I can repair some things for stalkers. It would be just great if I could get some tools for fine work and calibration.
Oh, good. Now I can finally repair things for stalkers. It would be just great if I could get a calibration toolkit.
Oh, good. It was tough without them. Well, It would be just great if I could some tools for fine work.
Finally! A whole set. Now I can repair just anything. I can even make an exoskeleton out of your suit. Well, no. I'm kidding.
That's what I'm talking about! Now I can repair things for stalkers. I just need tools for rough work and calibration for a full set.
That's what I'm talking about! Now I can make repairs and upgrades. I just need a calibration toolkit for a full set.
That's what I'm talking about! Now I can make repairs and upgrades. I just need tools for rough work for a full set.
Wow! Where did you get them?! These are great for complex things like upgrades, but aren't suitable for repairs. So it would be great if could you find tools for rough and fine work.
Wow! Where did you get them?! These are great for complex things like upgrades and now I can repair stuff with tools for rough work. Although it would be great if could you find tools for fine work.
Wow! Where did you get them?! These are great for complex things like upgrades. Yeah, we're almost done. I just need tools for rough work.
Hey man, lend me your ear for a minute will you?
Not now dude, I have to see a man about a horse.
Sure man, what's up?

I`m really down and out man finding it hard to even walk these days. I spoke to a medicine man and he said he will whip up something for me but that I need a gravi artefact, you wouldn't be a pal and get one for me would you? I can reward you handsomely!
Yeah sure no problem, I`ll be back with it soon.
Bless you brother!
Take care now.
Welcome back brother, did you get the artefact?
Not yet, I`m still looking.
Yes, here it is.
Hmm, this isn't a stone blood, I really need a stone blood.
You specifically asked me to get a gravi, I`ve no doubt about it.
Really? Sorry, it`s the illness you see, I get forgetful. Please, I really need a stone blood for the medicine man, please my reward will be worth it.
Ok, I`ll do it.
Look man, I`ve got better things to do with my time. You asked for a gravi and I gave you one, Goodbye!
Hey, you're back. Did you find one?
Not yet, I`m still looking.
Yes, here it is.
A stone blood, oh no, don't tell me I told you to get a stone blood? Look, you probably think I`m an idiot, but what I need is a meat chunk artefact, the medicine man requires it to heal me.
A stone blood, oh no, don't tell me I told you to get a stone blood? Look, you probably think I`m an idiot, but what I need is a gold fish artefact, the medicine man requires it to heal me.
A stone blood, oh no, don't tell me I told you to get a stone blood? Look, you probably think I`m an idiot, but what I need is a urchin artefact, the medicine man requires it to heal me.
A stone blood, oh no, don't tell me I told you to get a stone blood? Look, you probably think I`m an idiot, but what I need is a kristall thorn artefact, the medicine man requires it to heal me.
A stone blood, oh no, don't tell me I told you to get a stone blood? Look, you probably think I`m an idiot, but what I need is a soul artefact, the medicine man requires it to heal me.
A stone blood, oh no, don't tell me I told you to get a stone blood? Look, you probably think I`m an idiot, but what I need is a slime artefact, the medicine man requires it to heal me.
Look man, I`ll level with you, I`m not sick. I was just trying to get some artefacts the easy way seeing as my legs have been bad lately...
Ok, well, now you die!
Why the hell didn't you just tell the truth? Well you got two from me, you`re not getting a third, goodbye.
Sigh, I should've seen it coming, here, take this, you obviously need it more than I do...
Thank you brother, you are a scholar and a gentleman.
Don`t call me brother, you lied to me, I'm leaving now before I get angry, good day.
This is starting to tic me off, are you sure this time??
Yes, please, I`m sure of it this time, I`ll really make it worth your while!
Ok, but this is the last time!
You wasted enough of my time, Goodbye!
Please, I assure you, this is the last time, will you help me?
Are you sure you cant help an ill man find a stone blood?
Do you have the artefact yet?
Not yet, I`m still looking.
